entity.toywatergun.lava_projectile.descr: A projectile fired by toy water guns filled with lava that lights fire on impact.
entity.toywatergun.snow_projectile.descr: A projectile fired by toy water guns filled with powder snow that lights places powder snow on impact.
entity.toywatergun.water_projectile.desc: A projectile fired by toy water guns filled with water that extinguishes entities and blocks on impact.
lore.toywatergun.case: A case that holds a water gun.
lore.toywatergun.water_gun: A weapon that fires various liquids.
